advancements.tips.end.title: Approaching the End
advancements.tips.end.description: You can build an End portal in the Nether using a crying obsidian block surrounded by 8 sculk blocks and 12 End stones around it

advancements.tips.trader_2.description: Every 128 blocks mined, a trader will come to trade rare items
